description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. Aminal the Christmas game is a short simple platformer. The player takes control of one of the members of the band "Aminal" to collects bells in the fastest time possible and reach the snowy postbox at the end of level. points are based on time taken, bells collected and bells collected in rapid succesion (combo bonus). Only 7 very short levels.
